TextView.android:text: To start the game, place your penguin on one-fish tiles. If there are 2 players, each player will have 4 penguins. If there are 3 players, each will have 3 penguins. If there are 4 players, each will have 2 penguins.

To move a penguin, tap one of your penguins, then tap the tile you would like to move it to. A penguin can move in any of the six directions surrounding its tile, but it cannot jump over spaces or other penguins.If you make a mistake, you can deselect a penguin by tapping on it.
You lose penguins if a penguin can no longer make valid moves.
The game ends when every player loses their penguins.
